name: B B
text: Avoid at all costs. This man did my roof with two different colors and then tried to tell me time would help them match up.

name: Jessica Dingler
text: Good guy

name: Greg Robinson
text:
I worked with Cole Jones in getting a quote for our roof.  Cole was responsive, on time, and thorough with his appointment, inspection and sitting down with us about the condition of the roof and options for a roof replacement.

Sandy followed up with scheduling the roof replacement and all the paperwork which was in fantastic order.

Blair showed up on the job, arranged for good weather (just kidding) and did what they said they would do when they said they would do.

The knowledge, expertise and quality was evident at the end and we are very satisfied with our roof.  It has been four months and not a single leak and they also replaced our gutters.

It was a pleasure working with them.

name: Ian Thomas
text:
We had a great experience with Blair. I did my homework and got quotes from 5 other companies, but Blair blew us away with their authenticity, local roots and competitive pricing. After getting a lot of quotes, it was clear that at our price point, all the windows were essentially the same quality with the same bells and whistles; it was the install that would really make or break the project.

I was confident that our windows would be installed correctly and if any issues were to come up, that Blair would resolve them. The install went smoothly, a little over a month after buying. We had metal windows and the guys took the time to cut them out by hand and ensure our new windows went in seamlessly. Instead of just throwing up wood surrounds, they capped the windows with custom aluminum before sealing it all up.

From beginning to end, Craig Blair was very patient in walking through everything with us and ensuring we were informed and comfortable. I feel very confident in being able to receive service if anything goes wrong in the future. I highly recommend Blair.

resp.text: Thanks Ian. Our pleasure.

name: J Baker
text: I contacted Blair Exteriors to replace the roof on my home.  I was terribly disappointed.  They almost destroyed our beautiful scrubs, which had been growing for 15 years, by throwing the old shingles off the roof onto our scrubs.  It will take years to get them back to form.  Instead of having brackets for their ladders they placed their ladders against our gutters scrapping the paint and bending the gutters.  On top of that I noticed the workers standing on the gutters.  I reported this to Dan Aycock, the Blair representative, and when he finally came by the house all he talked about was how he was going to do something about this in the future.  They had the highest quote, but I wanted to support a local business and felt I would get a better job.  I hate that I am writing this, but others should be aware.  J K Baker

resp.text: Hey Mr Baker, I spoke with Dan and the installation crew about the issues you experienced. I want to first thank you for your business and apologize for the issues. This is not the experience we want to leave any customer  with. I believe our office staff has already reached out to you but if you need anything please reach back out to us. Reviews like this help us see where to improve. Thanks

name: Kelly Horwitz
text: In an age when everyone seems to have a bad story about finding a contractor, Blair Exteriors is a breath of fresh air.  We needed a new roof - a project I was dreading. Blair made it easy and efficient. They are the consummate professionals. They arrived on time and worked until the sun set to get our roof on in a single day. Then they returned the next day to make sure everything was fully cleaned up. Make them your first call when you need work done on your house!

name: Brandon Thompson
text: Blair replaced my roof last year and had an issue a year later that was not their fault but they were quick to help get it resolved. Great company and great staff. Russel was very helpful.

name: Hillary Cherry
text:
The salesperson contacted me and set up my appointment.  When he called the day of my appointment he stated he lived in Hueytown and did not want to travel an hour across town nor he did he want to drive an hour an half back home.  He then gave me an out of this world number and when I told him we received quotes much lower he said go with them.  How rude! For a company to have 4.8 stars out of 5 one would expect better customer service.

11/1/19:  I am upgrading my review to 3 stars.  I was contacted by the Director of Marketing at Blair Exteriors and he was very apologetic about my situation.  My husband and I would like to personally thank you and your team for reaching out to us and taking care of this situation.  This shows your commitment to providing excellent customer service.  We will definitely reconsider using your services in the future.  Again, thank you.

resp.text: We would be happy to work with you on a future project. Thank you for taking our call and letting us make it right!

name: David Counts
text:
Sales:  Jay was most informative.  Shared many options with us and respected our budget limitations.  He was never "pushy". Was able to find some affordable customization opportunities for us also.  He kept in touch throughout the process, not just after the sale was made.

Financing:  Jay also shared some financing options that were most helpuf.

Products;  We purchased new windows, siding for the entire home, gutters, and chimney caps. Everything looks great.  With the new windows and the additional insulation wrap that come with the siding, our electric bill has already shown an improvement (even with all the 90+ days we have had).

Workcrews:  Russell, the project manager kept us up to date for the times the different crews (one for the windows and siding, one for the gutters, and one for the chimney caps) would come by and kept us up-to-date with the progress of each crew.  The work was accomplished much faster than we anticipated.  The crews were professional,well versed in their craft, unfailingly polite, and were very careful to check with us for anything out of the ordinary before proceeding.  They answered any questions that we had and they were also very careful with their clean up everyday.

Bottom Line:  I would recommend Blair and commend them for their excellent service.

name: Nancy Prater
text: Love my beautiful new roof!  All my neighbors are talking about the efficiency of the crew.  They can't believe it was a one day project.  Everyone arrived on time and worked safely. Excellent support staff in the office setting up the installation date and selecting the matching shingles!

resp.text: Thank you! We have some of the best crews! Your roof looks amazing!

name: Brandon Parker
text: We were really pleased with the quality and professionalism of Blair Exteriors. Our roof looks really great and the crew was very polite. Thanks for doing such a stand up job!

resp.text: We strive to provide every customer with exceptional customer service.

name: Sarah Shelton
text: I have used Blair Remodeling for three projects. I have used them to remodel a shower, seal the shingles on my house and to finish an existing shed. The work looks incredible. The best part about this company was that when we gave them a budget they were able to come up with a way to do the work within budget. We will hire Blair for any future projects we have. We would highly recommend this company to anyone.

name: David Shepherd
text: We chose Blair to replace 29 wood windows with very nice modern vinyl windows - low e gas, double hung, reflective coating, etc. The sales team was patient, knowledgeable, respectful, and above all honest. The pricing was a very fair value for what we purchased. The installers were great to work with. Courteous, professional, & thorough. They took their time to do it right the first time and were focused on the job before them NOT trying to get to the next job! The exterior trim work was exceptional. Everything the salesman told me would be done was completed by the installers without me having to bird dog them to do it. Very happy we chose Blair.

resp.text: We are thrilled that you are excited about how your window project turned out! Thank you for sharing your experience.

name: Elizabeth Williams
text: Blair Remodeling did a great job restoring my house. My house was built in 1952 so it was very important to me to preserve the old world charm of the house. Blair Remodeling replaced wood siding with James Hardie plank siding. They were able to match and install new windows that are identical to those that were original to the house. They also replaced the roof. All of this was done without jeopardizing the character of the house and preserving the integrity of the structure. I will definitely use them again for future remodeling projects.

name: Brandon Quick
text: Blair put on a new roof on our house after we discovered hail damage.  They were a pleasure to work with through the entire process.  They helped us pick out a new color and helped us decide on the GAF golden pledge warranty.  The roof installation crew took time to answer my questions and did a great job.  They were courteous and cleaned up after themselves.   The new roof looks great and I am glad I went with the color change.  They were a little slow getting to my last post installation punch list item but my overall experience with Blair was positive and they did what they said they would do and did a top quality job.  I would use them again and highly recommend them.

resp.text: We are delighted that you had a great experience!

name: TriceUA
text: I had previously wrote a review stating issues I had with the windows I had purchased from Blair due to leaking problems and would like to revise my previous review. The leak issue was finally fixed from another contractor and the windows that Blair installed for me were never the issue. They actually remained in excellent condition! My contractor said it was amazing that the windows weren't damaged at all because of the leak; which was due to poor trim and frame installation of Signature Homes. The quality and craftmanship of Blair Windows is top notch and I recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: I want to thank you for the newest review of Blair. We will always be there to help our customers. Thank you for being a Blair customer.

name: Randy Moon
text: Superior sales staff. Excellent installers. Wonderful office staff. You will not regret working with these people.

resp.text: Thanks Randy! I hope you enjoy your new deck with family and friends.

name: Casey OQuinn
text: Can't say enough about the team at Blair.  They are without a doubt the most professional craftsmen around.  From start to finish the job was extremely smooth.  They show up when they say they will and the new windows we had installed are worth every penny and look fantastic.  Extremely happy with the results and I highly recommend Billy and his team!!

name: James Wilson
text:
Blair Remodeling replaced 26 of my old wooden double hung windows with Wincore vinyl windows.  I first met with Craig Blair on April.  He gave me a quote that same day.  He was very patient and was definitely not in a hurry to leave, even though it was late in the day.  He answered all of my questions.  After I thought about it for a while he came back another afternoon to answer more questions and show the demo window unit to my wife.  Again, very patient and in no hurry to be anywhere.

Made down payment in April.  He said they would install in early June.  That is exactly what happened.  The install took only three days.  They started on a Wednesday and finished on a Friday.  The install crew consisted of three guys.  They were extremely polite and cleaned up their mess each day.

There was only one major issue.  There were streaks and smudges on every window.  It looked like some kind of sealant that was not cleaned off during the manufacturing process.  I met with the lead installer on Friday morning and pointed this out to him and asked that he clean the windows.  He was very condescending and obviously did not want to clean the windows.  He said he would but I knew he would not.  I went back to work (my wife was home but said she would not enforce the window cleaning)

The project was finished when I got home Friday afternoon.  The windows looked great but . . . You guessed it.  There were still streaks and smudges on all the windows.  Not wanting to be a pain, I tried cleaning the windows myself.  The sealant was very difficult to remove.  It would not come off with glass cleaner alone.  I decided this should definitely be Blair’s responsibility.

I asked for a meeting with Criag Blair.  We met the following week.  He was very polite and patient.  He agreed to have the windows cleaned and address a few other minor issues.

It took a while, and to be fair, I was out of town for a week but we finally coordinated on having the windows cleaned.  The crew that did the installation came back out.  They came while I was at work.  My wife was home but declined to be the inspector.  They finished cleaning about 3 PM.  They waited for me to get home at 4:30.  We walked around and inspected all 26 windows.  There were a few touch ups but for the most part they did a good job.

In summary, I was very pleased and satisfied with the entire process.  I will definitely use Blair Remodeling in for any future projects.  Craig Blair is the best.  I totally trust him and I know that he will do whatever is necessary to make sure I am satisfied.  Hopefully, Blair will add cleaning the windows to their standard installation procedure.

resp.text: Thanks James!

name: Ed Guui
text: Blair Remodeling did an excellent job replacing the roof on one of my commercial properties. The job was very professionally done in a speedy manner.  The crew cleaned up the area as if they were never there.  The contract explicitly stated some shrubs or plants may be damaged due to the nature of the work. The building is surrounded with ornamental shrubs and trees. They took extra care to make sure nothing was damaged.  The job, the quality of the material, the speed the work was completed and the value for my money makes me happy to recommend Blair Remodeling. In fact, shortly after my job was completed, I had the opportunity to suggest to a friend to work with them on his remodeling project. He picked them and I followed up with him a couple weeks later to find he too had the same outstanding results.  I highly recommend Blair Remolding.

name: Vicki Ricketts
text: Have used Blair Exterior for years and have never been disappointed. A solid company with quality workmanship.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we did!

name: Steve Smith
text: We had 10 window replacements installed by Blair. The salesman that came was knowledgeable and courteous with our time, We will use them again.

resp.text: It was great working with you Steve!

name: Stephen Savincki
text: The work was top notch..... they were quick to respond to questions/concerns and treated us as if we were their only client! You will not go wrong using Blair I promise you!

name: Daniel Ferry
text:
We used Blair Remodeling to replace our roof. Their team was extremely knowledgeable about construction and roofing. They walked us through all of our options, and didn't pressure us. Their crew was professional , hard-working, and respectful of our home. They kept the work site (our yard) clean, and finished the project on schedule. We were so pleased with their work that we had them extend the roof over our patio and screen it in- not a an easy job on our house. They did beautiful work.

We are looking to do some window replacements this spring, and we will be calling Blair. We highly recommend them.

name: Manning Willingsby
text: Installations were all great and done in a timely manner. Crews were very conscientious and did excellent cleanup. We will be happy to contact Blair for any additional projects.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We strive to be the best! We can't wait for your next project!

name: Suzanne Picklesimer
text: We were pleased with the whole experience! We had windows replaced and exterior painting done. Everyone from the representative to the repair and painting crews did a great job!

resp.text: We are grateful that you had a great experience! Blair Remodeling is dedicated to our customers.

name: Florence Stewart
text: I scheduled for an estimate to replace a damaged metal roof.  The day they were to come out t received a call and was told Blair does not do metal roofs.  I had told.their receptionist when I called that I needed repairs for a metal roof.  The caller did apologize and stated the receptionist should have told me that before she scheduled the home visit.  I waited two days for the appointment and this was time wasted. Now I'm back to square one.  So disappointing 😟😟

resp.text: Hey Florence, It was great talking to you this morning. I hope we handled the situation to your satisfaction. Please call us anytime.

name: Jeanee Hawley
text: The salesman and installers were good but was delayed to weather. It rained on the day of install but they protected my roof and finished the install after the rain stopped. I would recommend Blair Remodeling to anyone.

resp.text: Weather is unpredictable but we have such a great team that does everything they can to protect your home. Thank you!

name: Chad Wilson
text: Blair Remodeling did an excellent job on the re-roof of my home. Very professional throughout the entire process; I would absolutely recommend them for your roofing needs. Very thorough from start to finish. Roof looks great!

name: Trey Moseley
text: Fantastic experience. Very well run company with outstanding employees, service, and craftsmanship. I have recommended them to friends and will definitely utilize their services again when needed.

name: Gary Wyatt
text: The guys at Blair went far beyond the call of duty to fix my roofing problems in time to sell my house. They diagnosed the problem, found an economical solution, then did exactly what they said they would do. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: We were happy to help! Thank you for your nice words!

name: Brian Dickerson
text:
When the time comes to remodel your home, look no further than the folks at Blair Remodeling.  We had the best experience with our home renovation, which included a new roof, windows, and a deck. Their professionalism, knowledge, and attention to detail throughout the project exceeded our expectations.  That trait is difficult to find these days with many contractors, but Blair impressed us from beginning to end. The crew was outstanding and delivered a quality installation in a timely manner that made our house look amazing.
We highly recommend the Blair team for your next project.  No wonder they have so many repeat customers!

name: Heather G.
text:
Billy and his crew were fantastic from beginning to the end and beyond. Billy is so easy to get in touch with - such a rare quality. He is super responsive, and he does what he says and in the time frame he specifies.

Being in the construction industry for over 10-years, I was not expecting how thorough and clean his crews were. I was majorly impressed with Mickey and the crew. They did a fabulous job on the roof, going above and beyond to make sure that any issue was taken care of. They really take a lot of pride in their work, and it shows.

Their whole team has been on-point with any concern after the initial install. Billy was fantastic in handling the claim with the insurance company. He definitely knows what he is doing and made everything super easy for us. We are super satisfied with the office and the field staff. They are thorough, considerate, clean and treat you like family.

I highly recommend Blair Remodeling for any roofing and repair/remodeling needs. There are a lot of scammers out there, so be careful and use someone you can trust. We trust Billy and his crews.

name: Virgil Williams
text: I used Blair many years ago and I am glad that I did. I had an issue with the windows they installed. They came out and verified it was a manufacturers defect and replaced my windows. Craig Blair was and still is a pleasure to work with.

resp.text: Thanks for being a Blair customer!

name: Jonathan Schneider
text: We selected Blair Remodeling for two projects - replacing our siding and building a new deck. We had a wonderful experience! Everyone at Blair was friendly and knowledgeable. Throughout the projects, there was clear communication, and we were consistently updated with timeframes and next steps.  And the workmanship/quality was top-notch! We got exactly what we wanted! We plan to use Blair Remodeling for our next round of home improvements.

name: Sammy Beasley
text: I had a great experience with Blair Exteriors. I had a deck rebuilt and 5 windows replaced.

name: Jerry
text: Exceptional service and selection of products. Installers were professional and timely. On-site supervisor reviewed work and any corrections were promptly made before leaving for the day. Craig Blair was on top of the project from pre-sale to post job completion.

name: Louii Rdgz
text: Blair Best roofing company out there coming from a worker!

name: Scott McWaters
text: Loved working with Blair Remodeling on our roof! They were beyond attentive with their costumer service, and the workmanship was nothing but professional. We plan to call them soon to install new windows.

name: Alan Cole
text: We received contracts from 3 companies and chose Blair to do our roof and windows and could not be happier. they took care of everything from start to finish.

name: Tony
text: Came by to give me a quote.  Stated quote would be delivered 2 days after inspection.  Never received it despite calling to remind them.  Waste of time and if this is how they do their quotes is this also how they schedule their work?

name: Heyward Gould
text: I have used Blair to replace the roof at my home, office and boat dock. Excellent work. We had a dedicated professional walk us through all our choices. He was on site for installation and followed up with a phone call. Couldn't be happier with the service and the finished product. I highly recommend Blair.

name: Steve Gates
text: Best decision I made is to change out my windows! I did not want the cheapest windows but I wanted the best windows for the best price and that is what I got from Blair Exteriors.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: David Lacey
text: Blair Remodeling did a fantastic job. Everything was done as quoted and installers were very professional. Will use them again if we do anymore exterior projects.

resp.text: Thank you for the nice words. We look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Stacey Lee
text: We used Blair Remodeling to replace our windows. They were fantastic! They were done very quickly and did great work. We will definitely use them again!

name: M Rose
text: Sometimes it's not doing the job 100% right that signals a great company, it's what they do when something goes wrong. This past spring, Blair Remodeling put a new roof on our house. The job went well and the roof seemed fine, but in the months afterward our cars got 3 flat tires from roofing nails; one tire was so damaged we needed to buy a new one plus a mate for it. Here's where I give high marks to Blair: they responded quickly, didn't argue or try to blame somebody else, and immediately compensated us for the damage. This is why I would recommend them. In this life nothing is perfect and things do go wrong, even for the best of us. If you go with Blair you can rest assured that they will stand behind what they do and take care of you, whatever happens.

name: Ronald Schrader
text:
Overall great work.
My wife and I are both very happy and wouldn't change a thing.
Will use Blair again .

name: Scott Danson
text: Courteous and professional. Quick response to messages and phone calls. Very happy with the price and quality of work.

name: Richard Stewart
text:
Blair Building and Remodelling have done a great job for us, every time we have hired them to do work on our house.

Everyone's professional and they do good work.

name: Sheri Partain
text: We had a lovely experience working with Blair. The people are so pleasant to work with and showcase the utmost professionalism and craftsmanship. Thank you thank you thank you!

name: The Plotts
text: Wonderful, professional service! Trustworthy and dependable. Working with Blair was a fabulous experience from start to finish.

name: David Eberhardt
text: From selling their product and services, to excellent completion of a challenging siding and exterior renovation project, Blair was exceptional in the guidance and workmanship they provided us. Definitely would use again and recommend to others!

name: Michael Chaz
text: Professional company with professional staff and installers. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a new deck or windows.

name: D Ross
text: We are happy with our new deck. We are imagining family gathered for many years to come.

resp.text: Family is important to us at Blair Remodeling. Enjoy you beautiful deck!

name: Kristy Reynolds
text: They did a great job and were very quick yet thorough.  Nice too!

name: Randy Wolfe
text: Good Job. Looks good. Cleanup could be better.

name: Bill Hart
text: Nice showroom.  Easy to see and experience  different offerings. Friendly,  non pushy staff.

name: Bama Jim
text: One Star is one too many.  I contacted this roofing company 1st.  Mainly due to the glowing reviews here on Google.  They're HIGHLY overrated I can say that with full certainty.  I set an appointment with them, and was told someone would be out.  It rained that morning but was going to clear later in the day but he canceled.  Said he'd be out the next day or two.  Four-five days later I write and ask "where you at?" so he says that he had "other appointments to take care of after I cancelled."  I CANCELLED??  It RAINED.  Ok, says he's coming out again... 10 AM.  At 4:30 he finally gets around to emailing me and says that he's "running behind" and not going to make it.  So giving the benefit of the doubt I allow him to reschedule yet AGAIN for Monday 3/12, again at 10 AM.  No show, no email, no call.  I don't care if he would do the job for $1,000 less than anyone else, I'd never use Blair for anything including roofing my dog kennel.

name: Tom Noon
text: Great experience working with them.

resp.text: We enjoyed working with you as well! Thanks Tom!

text: Fantastic crew, does amazing work!

name: Decie
text: Isbell handled the spray foam insulation, vinyl, and gutters on my new construction. The cost was fair and the work was quick and accurate. Keith did a great job sharing information and getting the work done in a timely manner. Steve did a hell of a job on the vinyl, and left not a single shred of material on the ground at the end of each day. The spray foam is one of the best decisions that we made for this house. The black gutters against the white house look awesome. Good job guys!

name: Chris Kozak
text: Keith and his crew put a deck next to our above ground pool.  It surpassed our expectations, and the craftsmanship is outstanding.  We are beyond pleased with their work.  We had a few small adjustments but thanks to the quick communication and responsiveness to our changes by Keith, the project finished in a timely manner and surpassed our initial vision of what it was going to look like.  We will call Isbell and Keith when we decide to do our siding and patio covering.  Thanks Keith and Isbell for a professional job well done!

text: I recently had some siding and exterior trim work done on my house, and Isbell did a fantastic job. Working with Keith was easy and they delivered on time at a great value. resp.text: This review is very inaccurate. The house he is speaking of was roofed by Isbell for another home owner 8 years ago. A few bricks from another area of the facade came off after repair and installation. They came and repaired it a couple of days later without a call having to be made. Our family will recommend and definitely use Isbell again for any home repairs!

name: Jason Polancich
text: Another example of an unreliable local Tuscaloosa home improvement company. Had them out week before Thanksgiving for a quote to replace/repair gutters on a historic home in downtown Tuscaloosa. Was told Id have a quote out by the next week and they'd be able to start within a couple weeks. Two weeks went by and no quote. I called them, was transferred to a rep named Mike "who handles all the gutters." He told me he'd follow back up with me by the afternoon. Now, first week of January, called back and got mike who said "We're not going to be able to help you on that job." Im guessing it was too low a cost threshold for them, but it would have been very nice to have known that back in November. Great people. Don't advertise gutter repair/replacement if you dont actually do the work!

They are in demand so you may need to wait a week or two until they can get to you, but for the quality and price it is worth being a little patient. I will definitely call them again should the need arise. I do recommend them if you need their services.

I had Isbell Insulation come out again this week and add a board and batten siding product to part of the front of my house. Frank and Jeff came in the morning and work was completed by lunch time. I could have not been more pleased with their quality of work and professionalism. These technicians really take a lot of pride in their work and it shows. This product has about half inch insulation rigid backing that makes it more solid. Looks like actual wood when driving up to the house. It matches other wooden board and batten we have on front of our house. I was tired of painting and replacing weather worn boards. We ordered color that matches the paint we have on the house. No more on ladder for me on this particular wall of the house. Once again i do recommend Isbell. Really nice technicians that do a great job. As other time price i believe was real reasonable.

text: Couldn't be happier. I'm selling my house, and buyers wanted a lot of minor repairs on the roof before moving forward with the purchase. Bryan contacted me right away and spoke to me on the phone about what I needed done. The same day he was at my property, evaluating the situation in person, walked me through his assessment and recommendation and he was able to bring a crew out within two days and get the work done. He was straight-forward, courteous, professional, and communicative throughout the process. And, the price was definitely fair. I owe Bryan, family and the crew a huge debt of gratitude for the outstanding service, especially in such a short time frame. Not to sound cheesy or anything, but it's great when a family-owned business treats customers like family. That's how it felt. I am so looking forward to giving them my highest recommendation to any friends and family in need of roofing services.

name: Jo Huffines
text: The day the third insurance inspector came to my home, Bryan, the owner met with him and he was able to explain why my roof needed to be replaced.It had been a battle up to that point. It took only 2 days for removal and installation of my new roof which is amazing because mine is very high pitch. Each day they cleaned up their debris (shingles, nails, etc..) and when the dumpster they used leaked hydraulic fluid onto my driveway, they pressure washed the spot. His crew even replaced a board on the side of my home that had a rotten spot. I cant tell you how pleased I am with the aesthetics of my new roof, not to mention how structurally sound it is. 2nd to None had the highest warranty (7 years) of all the companies I was considering which was also a deciding factor for me . Most only have a 5 years warranty and one had only 2 years. When a company can stand behind their workmanship, they deserve my business. Bryan also worked closely with me to make sure I had the right type of shingle (color, functionality). He also imparted valuable advice regarding which shingle manufactures are honoring their warranties. Also..it needs to be mentioned that before they installed the new roof, I had a portion of my old roof tarped but the wind blew it off. Of course heavy rains came and water was leaking in several spots on my roof and into my master bathroom/closet. It was raining and lightening when his crew got on my roof to retarp/stop the leakage. That was also a deciding point for me that I would be using his company for my new roof. I can tell you most companies would not have done that. Also Bryan worked diligently with my Allstate adjuster explaining the cost of the roof which they had initially underestimated. I highly recommend 2nd to None and I have been telling my coworkers/friends about his company as well.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your business and this wonderful review!!!
Bryan

name: Mack Haynes
text:
I couldn't have been happier with having 2nd2None Roofing and Construction do the inspection and roof/chimney repair work for my new home.  My realtors contacted Bryan Schram to do a detailed roof and chimney inspection for a home we put an offer on and eventually closed thereon.  We were fortunate that our realtors found a company in 2nd2None that could do both roof and chimney inspections.  I can't speak to the level of expertise of Yellow Roofing (the company the previous owner had do a second opinion and said the roof was fine); but I can tell you that I saw with my own eyes that the roof was in bad shape as noted by Bryan; and was very appreciative that 2nd2None Roofing was able to do the inspection on short notice as well schedule and complete the work so quickly after requesting the work to be done.

I called Bryan Thursday Dec 31st after closing and he was able to schedule a crew to come Wed Jan 6, 2020 and repair the chimney as well as replace the roof.  They brought in extra people and were able to get all the work done in one day because they knew it was going to rain today.

I am so thankful that they could do both roofing and chimney inspections as well as repairs.  If you need inspections and roof/chimney repair work, I would recommend using 2nd2None Roofing and Construction.

Mack
New Huntsville resident and homeowner

text: Patched my roof in September 2018. Started having a leak problem March this year. Called on April 2 was told he’d send someone out that day or next day no one ever showed up!! My husband is a disabled Veteran so he wanted me to request our money back so I did and Bryan has ignored our request. I also wanted to say he was very rude to me when I called on April 2 he proceeded to tell me after they came out I was never to call him again and that that whole side needed replaced. We were doing what we could afford! He has disrespected my disabled Veteran husband by not refunded our money or trying to fix it as leak was coming from his patch work.

resp.text: I’m sorry you feel that way. The first visit we came to inspect your roof, you had several issues going on. We advised to replace the roof, that repairs would be only temporary. You instructed us only to repair because of your budget. It obviously stopped the leaks for 7 months. I’m not responsible every time your roof leaks. You will keep having problems until you replace the entire roof.   Based on my histor y’and proven positive reviews  we don’t operate like your statements. Sorry for your troubles Bryan

name: Elena Johnson
text:
March of this year we hired MDH Construction to do a foundation repair job of one of our homes. With genuine sincerity we would rate this company,  under the leadership of its owner, Mike Hayes, as "Best in Class". The group is made up of dedicated professionals and highly skilled individual driven by high quality service comittment.
The repair MDH was hired to do was one that had been previously attempted by another foundation repair company. This was our second time addressing the same problem. While the first company ensured us the fix we paid for was permanent. It was short number of years later that we began seeing signs indicating the repair was failing . We found ourselves back at square one.
At the time we did not know MDH Foundation. We did reach out to the only other company we knew of thru advertisement only, and while we had someone come out assess and quote us a price, we chose to hold off. Very impressive sales presentation they did but we were just not convinced on their proposed corrective plan.  Some time later we hear of MDH, and a lot of good things being said of the owner, Mike Hayes. Not only on their foundation repair work, but as a very highly respectable contractor too.  Earlier this year we met with a member of the MDH team, and an assessment was made. Then before the job plan was finalized, the owner, Mike, came out to thoroughly go over the plan. It was the first time we felt really comfortable about the corrective plan.  Mike has a great group of professionals and skill guys that communicate well together. They were very attentive to our concerns, explained and answered every question.  They were punctual and respective of time. Always leaving area neat after each day.  We only wish we would have found MDH Foundation Repair the first time around.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. It was a pleasure working for you! :-)

"What makes a great contractor"  I hired MDH Construction, Mike Hayes, contractor to lift a sunken garage floor that was nearly 8 inches below level.  Due to the severity of the defective slab, it broke during the lifting process.  Honesty and integrity is what separates greatness from average.  Mike realized the lifting wasn't going as planned due to unforeseen circumstances.  Instead of walking away, which most contractors would do, he  instead wasn't willing to leave my  situation in a worse condition than when he started the job.   He repaired the slab above and beyond expectations at a MORE  than fair price.  I have finally found a real contractor that puts his reputation first.  First Class in all categories.  Thank you Mike! Open Crawlspace Encapsulation.
They have a technique to enclose an open crawlspace (i.e. pier and beam foundation) and install a dehumidifier. The underside of my house is drying out, and the moisture issues are fixed. I shopped around, and this procedure is expensive, but they seemed to be reasonably priced. They also quoted the best solution. Others wanted to install a dehumidifier under the house, but without encapsulating the underside. The dehumidifier would have been running constantly, trying to dehumidify all of Pascagoula. I have our termite people and our HVAC people come look at it, and both said that MDH did an excellent job.

name: Arthur Allen
text: Expert and simple to work with. The team was at the house checking to be certain everything was done well. Tidy up was careful and complete! I would give One Call Alabama my most noteworthy suggestion.

name: Laurence Bell
text: The people throughout the company are friendly, easy to communicate with, and the results of the roof workmanship are excellent.

name: Aliza Enna
text: They were fast and then inspected the rest of my roof. I had an emergency roof repair. Two shingles blew off and a big storm was coming. The repairman came out quickly and repaired the roof. I was very pleased.

name: Mary Tvedt
text: One Call Alabama has done a wonderful job for me. There was a hole in my roof that needed to be repaired. They got the job done in just over an hour. I am extremely happy with the whole process and highly recommend One Call Alabama.

name: Shaun Hudson
text: We called One Call Alabama after business hours. Scheduled appointment to have our roof repaired.  The tech showed up and quickly rectified the problem. Since they charge minimum service call, offered to fix anything else we needed to be done. Really impressed with the service. Definitely recommend!

name: Germain Willy
text: Courteous and prompt, always offer great customer service, at a fair price. Have used One Call Alabama several times and will continue to do so! Highly recommend.

name: Carl Jenkins
text: Quality items were utilized and the workmanship was superb. The proprietor was entirely learned and kept a nearby watch on the work as it advanced. The work took brief timeframe and done pleasantly.

name: Joseph Cox
text: From start to finish I discovered everybody from the proprietor to bosses directly on down to the team to be wonderful just as expert. I would strongly suggest them on the off chance that you at any point end up to be needing their administrations.

name: Barbara Johnson
text: Easy to work with them. They did a fabulous job on our projects. I am very satisfied with their work. I would highly recommend One Call Alabama to my friends and family.

name: Aracelysa Turpin
text: I'm extremely intrigued with One Call Alabama! William was on schedule, truly receptive, conscious, respectful, and learned about me and my rooftop. I would prescribe them to anybody.

name: Slainie Saindon
text: Great Service, Parts arrived quickly and as ordered, customer service came back quickly with inquiry about part shipment - Happy to recommend.

name: Chris Barber
text: Called them for a full master bath remodel quote. Came out and I had quote in a day or two and agreed to let them do it.  They were on time and very professional and completed the job to our specifications with no problems.  I would use these guys again 100% and would recommend them to anyone looking to do any project around the house!!

name: Gidge Black
text: My husband and I are so pleased to have found Once Call! Not only was their service reliable, their prices reasonable and their work quality but they were very friendly and easy to communicate with. We initially hired them to repair our roof and soon after, hired them to refinish two of our bathrooms and repair a hardwood floor threshold where we had a wall removed — all look great! We’ll definitely use them again for our next job and easily recommend them for any home improvement and repair. Thank you, One Call!

name: Selina Stovall
text: One Call did some concrete work for us after storm. They were very professional and timely. Work was excellent. We are very pleased with what they did for us and will definitely use them again!

name: Brett Walsh
text: They did exactly what was promised. Always happy to answer any of my questions. Great job One Call. I would definitely recommend them.

name: Tiziano Caliendo
text: One Call Alabama provided excellent service. They were good to deal with and work was completed on time.  Would highly recommend One Call Alabama.

name: Ansley Stovall
text: We used one call to redo our back porch!! These guys were awesome. Finished on time with 2 days to spare. They were professional and great to deal with. Would use them again.

name: Jessica Patmon
text: We had a water pipe burst in our kitchen and we were looking to have the damage repaired. Steve came out to our home and was very helpful with explaining how they work with insurance companies and he was honest and straight forward with his information. He really took time to explain everything and he answered all of my questions. Wonderful experience! Thank you Steve Stamba!

name: Genci Dushku
text: Not only have they done a great job but their after-sales service is amazing and we really appreciate it, thank you.

name: Rachel Schappacher
text:
We had a metal roof installed. I was not happy with the care given to our landscape or the cigarette butts left in my yard, but the roof was finished to our satisfaction. They were on time and stayed late to finish.
The contact people we were given were very good about responding to our questions/ concerns.
The interior teams that, completed our attic ladder replacement and ceiling work including painting, were very professional and efficient. I already recommended them to a neighbor!

name: Hunter Stovall
text: We had some damage to a room from hurricane and these guys did a fanatic job. Could not have asked for a more professional group. Thank you would highly recommend.

name: Kirsten UDFlyers
text: i have used One Call Alabama twice, once for exterior work and once for interior work. In both cases I was really happy with the work and the service. I had a dedicated person that i could call and he would answer! He answered all my questions and addressed any concerns or just curiosity that I had. Now my floors, master bath, screen doors, landscape lighting and repaired exterior all look fabulous and the process was stress free! They are licensed, insured, clean, and professional!!

name: Ferdinand Bucad
text: One Call Alabama has done a great job covering our home with a large screen porch, a new roof and a new concrete sidewalk. They finish all the work on time and budget.

name: Frank Lynch
text: One Call Alabama did an incredible job on a large screen porch addition to our house, new roof, and a new concrete sidewalk.  They finished all work on time and within budget.  Scott Willis was a wonderful Project Manager and kept us up to date daily as to the status of the project.  He worked with us as we added additional items to the project and was always available to answer our questions.  I highly recommend Scott Willis and the One Call Alabama Team!!

name: Miquel Jutras
text: I was kept informed and the roof looks great!

name: Alcides Palacios
text: fast paint company, which conforms to the competition market

name: Benjamin Epps
text: One Call Alabama took my clients call and provided same day service with a smile and a good rate to boot. They are on my list of "to call". Thanks Steve and Shane!

name: Matthew James
text: This company helped me the whole way through the process of my insurance claim. They replaced my entire roof and did a phenomenal job! They promptly showed up when the insurance adjuster came to ensure nothing was missed. The is a very professional company that I highly recommend. A+

name: Marie Livingstone
text:
Great team of people. Easy to work with & did a fabulous job on our “ projects”—- which included a new roof, new interior paint in almost every room of the house & about 5 new light fixtures! Every person we dealt with was terrific, starting w Sonny Gouge who started the whole project rolling
All the workmen arrived on schedule, did a great job & cleaned up afterwards. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience.

name: Mel
text: One Call Roofing did an excellent job for me. I had a leak in my roof which needed to be repaired. Sam went through all the details about what was involved in the roofing process, the estimate, the product, work involved. He gave me the pros and cons so I could make an informed decision about whether to just fix the leak or go ahead and get an entire new roof. As my roof is old and deteriorating I opted for a complete new roof. Sam was available throughout the process if I had any questions or concerns about anything. I have to add that Sam was the primary reason I decided on One Call Roofing. Carter scheduled the work and worked around my odd schedule. He kept me informed about when the workers would arrive. Joey was the roofing manager with boots on the ground while the work was being done. Mine was a "smaller" job, and only 2 workers were here to do the work in addition to Joey. They worked diligently throughout. I became concerned for them because they didn't even take a break until lunch at 1:45 and then didn't even take a full 30 minutes. The work was completed on the second day. Complete clean-up of all debris and nails was performed (they use high powered rolling magnets). During the roofing process an unavoidable incident occurred and as a result there was a small crack in the ceiling in my kitchen. Carter scheduled workers to come and fix the crack (again working around my schedule). The workers fixed the small crack and even graciously did touch-up paint on 2 other areas that were discolored due to my leaky roof. They completed the work in only about an hour. I am exceptionally pleased with the entire process and highly recommend One Call Roofing. Thank you One Call!

resp.text: Thanks Mel for helping to spread the word!

name: Pam Crider
text: Everyone was very nice & efficient.  They arrived on time. The roof looks great & very importantly, clean-up was complete. I had an issue and they dealt with it immediately. I would recommend them to friends.

resp.text: Very appreciative, Pam!

name: johnnie edwards
text: We decided on One Call when looking for a company to replace our roof. We were very pleased with their work, professionalism and hospitality. They not only completed our roof in a timely manner, they ensured that the outside of our house was free from trash and nails. The owners and staff don't just see you as a number but as a person. They were very kind and worked with our schedule as we had an unexpected crisis in our family during this time. They are good people- Highly Recommended!

resp.text: Wow Johnnie..... Thank you for the kind words and your approval!

name: Cathy B Johnson
text: We had a flood in our basement. We had no idea who to get to fix it. While walking around at the Birmingham Home Show, a man, Sonny Gouge, stepped out in front of me and very courteously said, “Ma’m, do you have any projects around your house that need to be done? Maybe a basement remodel?” Wow! I told him I did, he asked if OneCall could come out and talk to us and the rest is history. In the past year, OneCall has redone our basement, remodeled our main level and kitchen, put on a new roof and a new deck! Sonny has been by our side throughout this journey and I highly recommend OneCall for any work you need. Does not matter how big or small the job is.

name: Andrew Carmichael
text: Can’t say enough about how happy my wife and I are with this company. We had heard horror stories from friends about remodeling/dealing with contractors, so we were a little skeptical from the get go. After finding OneCall, we chose them based on the reviews from pst customers and the project estimate. From day 1, Scott couldn’t have been better! There was constant communication, attention to detail, and service above and beyond the scope of the project. They were extremely respectful of our house (while remodeling kitchen and upstairs bedroom) and were able to work around us. We HIGHLY recommend Scott and his team (Johnathan, Juan, and Dallas were amazing!)...seriously can’t say enough about how well they surpassed our expectations and didn’t stop until every detail was addressed. I rarely leave reviews on companies, but OneCall won’t disappoint! We will only use them for future projects and highly recommend them to anyone we know that needs work done.

name: The Burninator
text: Called John Dunn to have 3 rooms painted and a slab foundation for a building put down. He said he would be in the area by the end of the week and would call me to see when the best time would be. After never receiving a call back to set up appointment and now waiting till after the weekend, I had to call him and leave a msg on his machine. Instead of providing customer service and calling me back, he subcontracted the painting job to another company that called around the middle of week and didn't have a clue what I needed and I had to explain everything all over again. After 4 calls, back and forth with the subcontracted guy called Mr. Pittman, he shows up at my house, takes notes and my e-mail address and say he will have a quote to me asap about the painting and will have John Dunn contact me asap as well for the quote on the slab foundation. Over a week later and I still haven't heard from Mr. Pittman or John ever since. A total waste of time.

name: Ken Smith
text: On time , great service, clean up perfect. Great company, beyond expectations. Beautiful roof.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ken!

name: Stephanie Perry
text: Had a great experience with our roof replacement. Will use them again for additional home projects.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie! From roofing to remodeling and home additions, you'll always get the same high level of service from us.

name: taylorbradford2010
text: The level of work exceeded my expectations.  The team was friendly and made customer service their focus.  Would recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Taylor!

name: Tawanna Canty
text: I totally recommend this company. Nice staff and great team to work with. Thank you for your support and service.

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thanks for the recommendation, Tawanna!

(Original)
Thanks for the recommendation, Tawanna!

name: Brian Wendorf
text: One Call Remodel is a GREAT company.  I dealt with Steve and he did everything as promised.  I would definitely recommend these guys!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Brian!

name: Anne Reardon
text: Great service and communication as well as fair pricing & always made me feel I was the first priority.

resp.text: Our pleasure, Anne!

name: Patrick Miller
text: A call Alabama service is very good. I am tired of seeing their perfect work. They were doing everything beautifully. The roof of my house was completed by a professional and experienced person. I will return to them in all my later work. Thanks

name: Streetninja 0909
text: Absolutely terrible.   All of Pitney Bowes machines are down half the time or more. I will never use them again .  Ever.

name: Denise Curti
text:
They came to demo my garage and what a great team!!!
Thank You
Denise
Hitchcock Rd

name: James Jones
text: Your horrible driver broke my windshield. While on the phone he ran off the side of the road slinging rocks into my window.

resp.text: James, I am sorry to hear about your windshield.  Unfortunately I believe you left this review for the wrong company.  None of our vehicles have, or have ever had our company logo or name on them.  There is another company here in town that was previously Gulf Equipment.  They recently changed their name in 2018 to Gulf Services, confusing, I know.   Thank you for doing your due diligence before leaving this negative review.

name: Patricia Keller
text: Gulf Services removed floor and wall tiles from two of my bathrooms and my utility room. They were prompt, courteous, reasonable, and best of all, left everything perfectly clean and ready for new flooring to be installed.

resp.text: Thank you !!!

name: Jana Burns
text: Horrible. I called about getting an estimate and the guy named Shawn on the phone started cussing and was very unprofessional. He was a moron. I would not recommend this company to anybody. What an embarrassment it should be to work for that company.

name: Sharon Williams
text: There so busy they need a bigger place love the food an the girls there

name: Elisa Aldridge
text: Zach was quick, same day service, very nice and professional. He answered all of our questions and was up front about the associated costs and repairs. Happy with our service. He waited until we were satisfied before leaving which was highly appreciated.

name: Scott Certain
text: Quality work.  Our ac went out and they replaced our unit in one day.  The modifications to adapt the new unit to our 15 year old duct work was top notch.   I hope this unit lasts as long the last one.  You guys rock.

name: Kaitlin Williams
text: Would highly recommend! I received several quotes from various well-known companies around town for a new unit purchase/install and some relatively extensive modifications to our ductwork. A1 not only provided one of the more reasonable quotes for the new unit, but they also provided the most viable solution to our ductwork issues that wouldn’t also break the bank. Unlike the questionable sales tactics I experienced with some of the other companies, Steve was extremely professional and straightforward throughout the entire process. He answered all of my questions (there were A LOT of them) and was always happy to go the extra mile by walking me through everything in detail. The day of the install far exceeded my expectations as well. The technicians with Steve were courteous, extremely knowledgeable/capable, and worked hard until the entire job was completed. Their quality of work was impressive as well. It seemed like a tough job, but these guys made it look easy! 5 stars all around for the entire A1 team!

resp.text: Thank you Katlin for the awesome review.  It was a pleasure working with you on this project. We always like a good challenge. We will always be here for you.   Steve

name: Valinda Murphy
text: Had a great experience with Tech., James. Very professional; great value; good communication; I will use them again.

name: Dave Luck
text: I had an emergency call for them.and they dealt with my problem.knoledgeable staff.with good hearts.im a cancer patient .recently diagnosed.i couldnt be in the heat.while on the meds prescribed to me.as soon as they found out.they expedited the repairs.it took 2days .but they went and got my part.it was the compresor.under warranty. But had to be sent from somewhere way off.so they hooked up a small partable unit 4 me .so I could stay in my home.it saved us alot of money.then they fairly charged for ther great service.it felt great to deal with people who cared about my situation.so much they went the extra mile for us.i will always call them to service any a/c concerns I have in the future. Thank you all for everything. A1 is a great company.

name: Britt Sanford
text: Air went out on Tuesday evening and Steve was at our house first thing Wednesday to quote us a new unit. We have been fighting with our current old unit for years, so we knew when we called we were getting a new unit. After looking at our house and realizing I was 8 1/2 months pregnant he said soonest would be Saturday. Was far away to me, but we said okay. Thursday rolled around and Steve called and said I can be there at 7am Friday. The crew showed up right at 7 and worked hard. They fixed issues that were found during installation that were not part of the quote to make sure we got everything out of a new unit. Very professional group of men. They made sure everything was correctly installed from areas we were not fixing and went above and beyond replacing areas that were part of our quote. Their professionalism, quick response and turn around time will always keep customers coming back. You cannot go wrong with this company. You can tell it is ran as a team and not just another business. We will definitely be recommending them to everyone, as they were recommended to us by a friend.

resp.text: thanks Britt

name: Kara Williams
text: I had a bad experience with a competitor on a repair, and decided to go with A1 on my new system.  Steve was on-time for the proposal and he and his crew were on time for the install.  I thought their proposal offered the best terms, and no issues so far.  I will definitely call them again in the future if I need AC service.

name: Hal Ledbetter
text: Outstanding responsiveness and service. Our AC went out on Memorial Day. Sharon responded almost immediately and made an appointment the next day, accommodating my availability. Zach the repair specialist replaced a start capacitor on the outside heat exchanger and the computer board on the attic unit air handler. Fully restored AC the same day. All around excellent professionalism.

resp.text: Thanks Hal! Glad we could get you help!

name: LISA BRAGG
text: A 1 was an amazing company to do business with! They always contacted me ahead of time and were on time, every time! They guarantee their labor and parts and came through on this for me. I have never done business with a company that was so honest, reliable, and professional before. Thank you A 1 for all that you’ve done!

resp.text: Thanks Lisa

name: Megan Roegner
text: A1 was super responsive, they got Zach out to check and repair my A/C unit within 24 hours. I would absolutely recommend them to anyone in this area!

name: Kendall Lewis
text: Our A/C unit suddenly stopped working a few nights ago. We called A1 the next morning and we got an appointment immediately. Zach was our technician along with Dustin. Both were very professional and helpful. Any questions I had were answered immediately. I would definitely recommend these guys to anyone wanting professional and efficient work done at a fair price.

resp.text: Thanks Kendall!

name: BAP 5068
text: Heater wasn't working on a Saturday called them up and were able to see us that day. A tech came out and found the problem and fix it. A week later it wasn't working again. Call them up on a Saturday and again able to send somebody out same day. Zack showed up and figure out what was wrong. Fix it and with no extra fees as it was still cover from last weeks visit. Zack did a great job. Recommend using A1 Heating and Cooling A/C

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Adam Chapman
text: Called A1 when my unit stopped blowing air, despite being very late in the afternoon Zach came over and was able to fix a faulty blower motor and get it blowing ice cold. The next day the temperature dropped drastically and when we tried to use our heat we noticed it was not working. I called A1 and they had Brady come over to inspect and bring me a space heater to keep my wife warm while the issue was assessed. The following day Zach was over at my house bright and early as promised to fix the issue. Zach was able to determine our newest problem was simply a faulty wire connection with our nest thermostat. I highly recommend A1. Zach went above and beyond to fix everything all while understanding that I was on a tight budget. It really meant a lot when Brady came over with a space heater just to keep my wife warm and happy. These guys will be my go to for any hvac needs. Thanks again Zach, Brady, and Sharon for saving the day and being awesome people!

resp.text: Your welcome, thanks for the awesome review!

name: Josh Cato
text: These guys were amazing!  I called in a panic when my AC broke last night but they calmed my nerves and were very accommodating. I called right after they opened hoping I could get someone today. Originally they said they could get someone out to my house around 2:00 PM but the receptionist said that she wanted to check and asked if she could call me back. She called me back 10 minutes later and told me Zack would be at my house around 10:00 AM. Zack actually called me 2 hours before he was supposed to be there and told me he’d be at my house in 10 minutes. 10 minutes later, Zack knocks on my door. It took him about 5 minutes to diagnose the problem when he came in and told me how much it would cost before he did anything - which I liked. It was a very affordable price for the repair as well I thought. He had my AC unit repaired in under 3 minutes. I really appreciate how this company handled me as a customer. I call expecting to be miserable and sweating all day, and they had my AC fixed before the the time they had scheduled my appointment initially . I chose to go with this company because of their rating on Google and it’s easy to see why they’re rated so high. It reflects my sentiment as well. Well above 5 stars and would absolutely, without-question would use again.

name: Antwuan Forte
text: The Owner of A1 is a very stand up guy and makes sure the customer is satisfied

name: James Denney
text: Excellent service and installation of two 16 SEER HVAC units for my home.  Steve was extremely courteous and conscientious in providing all the  Bryant options and answering countless questions. Alex, Brady, and Nelson were professional and courteous and they did a fantastic job of installing both units in record time with no delays.  Definitely recommend this outstanding company for any of your heating and AC problems.

resp.text: Happy to be of service, thanks, James!

name: Sunny Lloyd
text:
Just wow guys.

We had five companies come out and they all said we’d need a new unit. As anyone looking at these reviews probably knows, that is extraordinarily expensive and a nail biting experience. We got a quote from A1 which was incredibly competitive, and my husband was able to quickly schedule.

Today they came out and realized that our unit is still perfectly usable, the issue was merely a broken fan. Luck was on our side here, but the main takeaway should be the honesty and integrity of this company.

They are not going to suggest to you superfluous items or charge you for things that you do not truly need, and that level of professionalism is so rare.

They will be our first call forever from now on.

resp.text: thanks Sunny!

name: Jason Mefford
text: I would highly recommend A1.  They were great from start to finish.  They were pleasant when I called and showed up on time with a courtesy call before they arrived.  The technician (Zach) was extremely knowledgeable and professional.  He walked me through the troubleshooting process and educated me on the fix.  I would recommend A1 to family or friends looking for AC assistance.

name: Joseph Siebern
text: It is currently 7:05 and Zack is heading to Lowes to get the parts needed to fix my issue. A1 provides great service! They are straight up, they do not play games, they show you the problem and provide you a now strings cost to fix it. Zack diagnosed the problem in probably 5 minutes, had my quote in 10 and I am sure he will work quickly, but more importantly I am confident he is going to do a quality job so it doesn't happen again.  highly recommend for anyone in the Huntsville area to give these guys a call , same day service and will work late hours to fix your problem.

name: Roger Wisnosky
text: I had A1 replace my upstairs unit in October 2018 and I was totally happy with their knowledge and service.  My downstairs unit went up last week and I had Brady come out to check it out and decided it was best to replace.  Not only do they replace the units, they also are very good at inspecting other aspects to make sure everything is done correctly.  I highly recommend A1 and their staff for all your HVAC needs.

name: Cynthia S
text: I would recommend A1 HVAC. I used them to install a new unit. They went above and beyond to see that I had proper airflow in my home.

resp.text: thanks Cynthia!

name: Tiffany Kimbrough
text: This company is GREAT! I literally called at 7:30am, and they had someone out by 9:00! Zack was great and professional. I told him what the issue was, and what I had attempted on my own to try to fix the issue. He listened! After that, he checked some things out, and had the issue identified and rectified in 10 mins top! He also took the time to walk me through different things that I could do on my own to help upkeep my units. I DEFINITELY recommend them, and will forever use them as my go to company!!

name: stacey lightsey
text: I would recommend this company and Dustin Clifford to anyone needing heating or air repair. I called at around 10 am and by 2 am they had drove 40 minutes to my house, serviced my unit, fixed 2 parts, and had it running like a top. Did I mention it is pouring rain and only 4 days till Christmas? He never made any mess, Dustin explained every step and ask if each step was ok and told me price as he went. No surprises! He was also the nicest man, always polite and smiling even though he was soaked in rain and had to get out a yucky mouse. He cleaned up everything and removed all waste. I will never call anyone else for help. This was top of the line service in record timing. I rate them 5 star and would recommend them to everyone I know. And definitely recommend Dustin again. Best service ever!

name: Jennifer Ashworth
text: Woke up at 2 am on a Saturday to a 60 degree house. Called A1 at 7:30, and Zach was here at 9. He was very professional and nice. Fix the unit quickly and also updated the the circuit for our new thermostat to avoid that becoming an issue. We are very pleased and will definitely use them again.

name: Joe Azar
text: Highly recommend. Have worked with them over the years for minor repair or recharging a system. Service techs were always on time and efficient. Finally the AC unit went out in July and had them replace it. The two service techs were on time, very pleasant and did an outstanding job from getting the old unit out, the new unit in, ensuring everything worked and did a good job of cleaning up afterwards.  I highly recommend them to anyone needing AC service.

name: Ryan Stutzman
text: My go to people. First experience was great, the Tech walked me through the whole process of his diagnoses and how to fix it. Second time 2 years later with a different problem, I called Monday morning at 7am and the tech was out by 9. Quick assessment of the problem, communicated the problem and Quote was right where I expected.  100% recommend to friends and neighbors, will continue to be my go to HVAC company.

name: Kris Hankinson
text: A1 has been my air-conditioner maintenance choice since I moved here in 2012. Every time I have called them for periodic maintenance they have arrived on time and have been quick and reasonably priced. Recently my air-conditioner stopped working on a Saturday. I called Steve and he assigned Zach, who called to let me know when he would arrive, and he arrived by the time he said he would. He quickly diagnosed the issue and replaced the bad part. The price was very reasonable, plus they warranty the parts and the service fee is good for 30 days in case you need to have them come back. They have definitely earned my loyalty!

name: Susie Brown
text:
We got a quote from Steve for our new HVAC package unit and it was similar to other quotes but felt he really knew his business. He and one of his installers showed up this week and worked in the intense heat & humidity to install our 4 ton unit. They did a great job and sheet metal work is impressive. So happy with our unit. It is a Bryant and so quiet we can't hear it running. I am a Realtor and will be referring him to my clients.
After working all day on our install he took the time to visit my client that just bought at home on our street to check out one of their units that was not working correctly. They also were impressed by his honesty and knowledge.

July 3rd one month after new install. Got our first utility bill and it was only $181 for our 2385 sq. ft. ranch. Lowest bill in 18 years. This unit runs so quiet and puts out a lot more volume. Thanks Steve!!!!

name: Joy Dumes
text: Wow! I am so impressed with this company.  Our first contact was with Sharon and she was so very helpful.  She scheduled us right away.  Our technician was Zach and he was so prompt and helpful.  He was there exactly at the time that was scheduled.  He was very thorough and he even took time to educate me on exactly what was going on with our AC unit.  I could not have been more pleased.  We are not from this area and had no idea who to call, but because of the superior service we received, we will definitely be using this company going forward.  Thanks to Sharon and Zach for your great customer service!

name: Treena Waters
text: I rely on reviews when I'm looking for services. The reviews for this company were right on target. From the time I called for services to the end, I was informed of everything going on. Tyler was very professional. He explained everything to me and quoted me a fair price. If I need these type of services in the future, A1 will be who I call. I will also recommend this company to others.

name: Melissa Scofield
text: Excellent service! Zach was very nice and professional. He diagnosed and fixed the problem in a timely manner. Thank you! We will  definitely be using your services in the future and recommending you too.

name: Neil Young
text: So my AC was giving us problems and we've had great service from A1 so we called again.  Honestly nervous that they would be to busy but nope they had Zack out not long after I called.  I can't say enough on how helpful and friendly Zack is and extremely knowledgeable at his trade. Thankfully our issues were from me not changing my filter and caused our unit to freeze up. You can't beat having a company that can get to you quickly and being friendly.  I highly recommend giving them a try for your AC needs. The rates are great and the staff does what they can to help which means a lot t hu is day and time. Thanks A1

name: Jarod
text: Had a unit blowing out warm air. The technician stopped by to perform a diagnostic and had to have been there for all of 15 minutes. He came by, determined there was a leak, called and told me he added some refrigerant and told me to give him a call if I had any more problems. The guy was really nice, but he didn’t even attempt to fix the leak. So, one week later, we were calling someone else to come and fix the leak.

resp.text:
Jarod,
We are deeply concerned with your negative service experience.  We pride ourselves in excellent customer service and therefore want to refund your money.  Please call our office at 256-975-6616 so we can resolve this as quickly as possible.  Once again, we are very sorry.
Steve

name: sebastian ferreiras
text: They were outstanding! and also offered the best prices with value. Best in town 👍🏽

name: Neil Young
text: I can't say enough good about this place.  I have to say Zack the service technician that showed up to help this morning is an amazing person.  The service was fast and extremely efficient and fast. Zack was extremely helpful and knowledgeable and has us fixed up perfectly.  I highly recommend checking them out.  They have been the best we have used several different heating and cooling service businesses and by far A1 has been the best.  I plan on sticking with them on all of my heating and cooling service needs.

name: Megan Taylor
text: The staff and technicians with A1 heating and cooling are very professional and efficient. They were able to come to the house when we requested and offered excellent service and price. I will be using them again when we need HVAC repairs in the future.

text: One of the best experiences we’ve ever had with a service company. Zach was extremely knowledgeable and courteous. He went well above our expectations, even taking the time to install a new thermostat free of charge. The service was done quickly and the price was very reasonable. We definitely won’t have to look for another HVAC company as long as A1 is around.

name: J K
text: So glad we chose this company to fix our AC. They came out to our house very fast and fixed it first thing the next morning. Tyler was our technician and did a great job. We are very happy with our service and A1 will definitely be our go-to for heating and air!

name: Stephen Keel
text: Thank you Zach for coming out on a Sunday morning to get our air conditioning going again. Zach found and fixed the issue very quickly. Me and everybody else in my household appreciate you. Also thank you A1 Heating and Cooling for being so responsive to my call and email.

name: MorningCoffeeMeds
text: Fast, friendly, professional service! had to have my entire unit replaced. Which happened without a hitch in one day!

name: David A. Rivera
text: I was extremely impressed with the service Steve performed for Donna and I on our home heating and AC unit.  I have been unimpressed with our unit’s performance since the day we built and moved into our home in 2001.  We have had several technicians service our unit with little or no improvement in its performance.  The knowledge, professionalism, service and patience that you delivered helped to answer all of our questions.  Our unit has never worked better.  We are extremely satisfied and would strongly recommend you to all of our friends and anyone looking for quality heating and AC service.  We trust the quality of your work completely.  Thank you very much!
